content:
1.  The tool uses hardcoded values instead of configurable properties and defaults in almost all places (4)
2.  Add an ability to add teams (1)
3.  Provide explanation and configuration of default team behaviors (1)
4.  Provide an ability to modify existing strategies (1)
5.  Provide an ability to create new strategies (1)
6.  Make the sound and other GUI features configurable (2)
7.  Provide an ability to pause the simulation (1)
8.  Provide an ability to "rewind" a simulation  to a specific day (1)
9.  Add tasks to the simulation \[optionally with happiness value\] (1)
10.  Add business value to the simulation, plus a BV burnup chart (1,2)
11.  Provide configurable ability to switch between "burndown" and "burn-up" charts (2)
12.  Add "idealized" burnup (down) lines \[the dashed line\] to burndown/up charts (2)
13.  Add more User Stories (these are presently randomly generated from a set of strings if you look in the code) (1)
14.  Provide an ability to run a simulation of a Taiga project/sprint \[import via API\] (3)
15.  Add team members to the simulation (1)
16.  Add blockers/spikes to simulation (1)
17.  Add "storyless" tasks to simulation (1)
18.  Make multi-sprint (release-based) simulations (1)
19.  Add epics (1)
20.  Add Product Backlog, and planning phase to tool. Provide ability to have an auto-strategy for selecting Sprint Backlog, or a manual one (1)
21.  Provide an ability to save and re-run a simulation (1)
22.  Presently information is logged to the console. Put in the tool or a logfile (4)
23.  I notice a bug when I run a second simulation (Exception - "doneDay must not be less than startedDay") (4)
content_html:
1. The tool uses hardcoded values instead of configurable properties and defaults in almost all places (4)
  2. Add an ability to add teams (1)
  3. Provide explanation and configuration of default team behaviors (1)
  4. Provide an ability to modify existing strategies (1)
  5. Provide an ability to create new strategies (1)
  6. Make the sound and other GUI features configurable (2)
  7. Provide an ability to pause the simulation (1)
  8. Provide an ability to "rewind" a simulation  to a specific day (1)
  9. Add tasks to the simulation [optionally with happiness value] (1)
  10. Add business value to the simulation, plus a BV burnup chart (1,2)
  11. Provide configurable ability to switch between "burndown" and "burn-up" charts (2)
  12. Add "idealized" burnup (down) lines [the dashed line] to burndown/up charts (2)
  13. Add more User Stories (these are presently randomly generated from a set of strings if you look in the code) (1)
  14. Provide an ability to run a simulation of a Taiga project/sprint [import via API] (3)
  15. Add team members to the simulation (1)
  16. Add blockers/spikes to simulation (1)
  17. Add "storyless" tasks to simulation (1)
  18. Make multi-sprint (release-based) simulations (1)
  19. Add epics (1)
  20. Add Product Backlog, and planning phase to tool. Provide ability to have an auto-strategy for selecting Sprint Backlog, or a manual one (1)
  21. Provide an ability to save and re-run a simulation (1)
  22. Presently information is logged to the console. Put in the tool or a logfile (4)
  23. I notice a bug when I run a second simulation (Exception - "doneDay must not be less than startedDay") (4)

wiki_pages.content:
1.  The tool uses hardcoded values instead of configurable properties and defaults in almost all places (4)
2.  Add an ability to add teams (1)
3.  Provide explanation and configuration of default team behaviors (1)
4.  Provide an ability to modify existing strategies (1)
5.  Provide an ability to create new strategies (1)
6.  Make the sound and other GUI features configurable (2)
7.  Provide an ability to pause the simulation (1)
8.  Provide an ability to "rewind" a simulation  to a specific day (1)
9.  Add tasks to the simulation \[optionally with happiness value\] (1)
10.  Add business value to the simulation, plus a BV burnup chart (1,2)
11.  Provide configurable ability to switch between "burndown" and "burn-up" charts (2)
12.  Add "idealized" burnup (down) lines \[the dashed line\] to burndown/up charts (2)
13.  Add more User Stories (these are presently randomly generated from a set of strings if you look in the code) (1)
14.  Provide an ability to run a simulation of a Taiga project/sprint \[import via API\] (3)
15.  Add team members to the simulation (1)
16.  Add blockers/spikes to simulation (1)
17.  Add "storyless" tasks to simulation (1)
18.  Make multi-sprint (release-based) simulations (1)
19.  Add epics (1)
20.  Add Product Backlog, and planning phase to tool. Provide ability to have an auto-strategy for selecting Sprint Backlog, or a manual one (1)
21.  Provide an ability to save and re-run a simulation (1)
22.  Presently information is logged to the console. Put in the tool or a logfile (4)
23.  I notice a bug when I run a second simulation (Exception - "doneDay must not be less than startedDay") (4)

task.subject: Create Product Backlog

content_diff:
1. The tool uses hardcoded values instead of configurable properties and defaults in almost all places (4)
2. Add an ability to add teams (1)
3. Provide explanation and configuration of default team behaviors (1)
4. Provide an ability to modify existing strategies (1)
5. Provide an ability to create new strategies (1)
6. Make the sound and other GUI features configurable (2)
7. Provide an ability to pause the simulation (1)
8. Provide an ability to "rewind" a simulation  to a specific day (1)
9. Add tasks to the simulation \[optionally with happiness value\] (1)
10. Add business value to the simulation, plus a BV burnup chart (1,2)
11. Provide configurable ability to switch between "burndown" and "burn-up" charts (2)
12. Add "idealized" burnup (down) lines \[the dashed line\] to burndown/up charts (2)
13. Add more User Stories (these are presently randomly generated from a set of strings if you look in the code) (1)
14. Provide an ability to run a simulation of a Taiga project/sprint \[import via API\] (3)
15. Add team members to the simulation (1)
16. Add blockers/spikes to simulation (1)
17. Add "storyless" tasks to simulation (1)
18. Make multi-sprint (release-based) simulations (1)
19. Add epics (1)
20. Add Product Backlog, and planning phase to tool. Provide ability to have an auto-strategy for selecting Sprint Backlog, or a manual one (1)
21. Provide an ability to save and re-run a simulation (1)
22. Presently information is logged to the console. Put in the tool or a logfile (4)
23. I notice a bug when I run a second simulation (Exception - "doneDay must not be less than startedDay") (4)
content_html:
1. The tool uses hardcoded values instead of configurable properties and defaults in almost all places (4)
  2. Add an ability to add teams (1)
  3. Provide explanation and configuration of default team behaviors (1)
  4. Provide an ability to modify existing strategies (1)
  5. Provide an ability to create new strategies (1)
  6. Make the sound and other GUI features configurable (2)
  7. Provide an ability to pause the simulation (1)
  8. Provide an ability to "rewind" a simulation  to a specific day (1)
  9. Add tasks to the simulation [optionally with happiness value] (1)
  10. Add business value to the simulation, plus a BV burnup chart (1,2)
  11. Provide configurable ability to switch between "burndown" and "burn-up" charts (2)
  12. Add "idealized" burnup (down) lines [the dashed line] to burndown/up charts (2)
  13. Add more User Stories (these are presently randomly generated from a set of strings if you look in the code) (1)
  14. Provide an ability to run a simulation of a Taiga project/sprint [import via API] (3)
  15. Add team members to the simulation (1)
  16. Add blockers/spikes to simulation (1)
  17. Add "storyless" tasks to simulation (1)
  18. Make multi-sprint (release-based) simulations (1)
  19. Add epics (1)
  20. Add Product Backlog, and planning phase to tool. Provide ability to have an auto-strategy for selecting Sprint Backlog, or a manual one (1)
  21. Provide an ability to save and re-run a simulation (1)
  22. Presently information is logged to the console. Put in the tool or a logfile (4)
  23. I notice a bug when I run a second simulation (Exception - "doneDay must not be less than startedDay") (4)
